Error"]}``````{r}MyData = read.csv('A_B Test Experiment Quiz - cleaned.csv',fileEncoding="latin1")sum(is.na(MyData))``````{r}set.seed(1979)Match <- matchit(Treatment ~ factor(Gender) + factor(Age) + factor(Education) , data = MyData, method = 'nearest', caliper=0.01)summary(Match)``````{r}MyData.match <- data.table(match.data(Match))Matched.ids <- MyData$id %in% MyData.match$id``````{r}View(MyData.match)``````{r}ols <-lm(Score ~ Treatment + factor(Duration) + Treatment*factor(Duration) + factor(Gender) + factor(Age) + factor(Education) , data = MyData.match)cl.se.treatment <- cl.se(ols, MyData.match$ID)stargazer(ols,ols,title="OLS Timer on Score",se = list(NULL,cl.se.treatment), type="text",column.labels=c("OLS","OLS with clustered error"))``````{r}ols_duration_not_fac <-lm(Score ~ Treatment + Duration + Treatment*Duration + factor(Gender) + factor(Age) + factor(Education) , data = MyData.match)cl.se.treatment_non <- cl.se(ols_duration_not_fac, MyData.match$ID)stargazer(ols_duration_not_fac,ols_duration_not_fac,title="OLS Timer on Score (duration not factorized)",se = list(NULL,cl.se.treatment_non ), type="text",column.labels=c("OLS","OLS with clustered error"))```
